Text: I don't get it, the torrent is all swedish, icelandic, whatever, but you speak english?

why not label the movie is swedish, describe it in swedish, and even better yet have a filter here so i can strain out all the stuff I'll never be able to understand that's not in english. Why isn't there a search filter here at PB?

If swedes can learn english, the americans can learn swedish if they want to know what's going on in the world. And you can turn off the swedish subs when you are at it, you will still catch enough words to know what you need to know. Violence is an universal language.
